project_descr: The project aims to strengthen local capacities, incentives and actions for integrated landscape management in order to reduce land degradation, greenhouse gas emissions, promote nature conservation whilst enhancing sustainable local livelihoods in Samoa

outputs.output_descr: Strengthening Multi-Sectoral Management of Critical Landscapes (SMSMCL) in Samoa
